name: Aroor Dinesh Dileep
content: Dr. Dileep A. D. << IIT Mandi Dr. Dileep A. D. Phone: +91-1905-300047 EMail: addileep[at]iitmandi[dot]ac[dot]in Address: School of Computing and Electrical Engineering Room No 12, 2nd Floor, A3 Building, IIT Mandi, Kamand Campus, Kamand - 175005 Himachal Pradesh India Research interests Pattern Recognition Kernel Methods for Pattern Analysis Machine Learning Speech Technology Computer Vision Education Ph.D. in Computer Science and Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology Madras, Chennai Thesis title: Matching based Dynamic Kernels for Classification of Varying Length Patterns of Speech M.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology Madras, Chennai B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering from Rural Engineering College, Bhalki, Gulbarga University, Karnataka Work Experience Academic Research Experience School of Computing and Electrical Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology Mandi, Mandi Associate Professor: October 2019 - Till Date School of Computing and Electrical Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology Mandi, Mandi Assistant Professor: August 2013 - October 2019 Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology Madras, Chennai Project Officer: April 2012 - December 2012 Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology Madras, Chennai Project Associate: June 2006 - December 2006 Teaching Experience Department of Computer Science and Engineering, N.M.A.M.
